name: Hapi Birds
description:
Asalam o Alaikum 

We have Finally Made our New Game Hapi Birds v1.0

in This Release you will play a Hapi Bird trying to find its way home Before 

" One-Minute Time" Run out  Then you Have  to Start From First Level.

Controls For Pc : 

    Use Mouse to Make Hapi Bird Fly

Controls For Mobile :

    Use Finger to Make Hapi Bird Fly

This Release Have 15 Levels 

&

Your Sharing This Game will Help us a Lot.

Give your Feedback and Support us Financially 

Thank you So Much  ^_^
